Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (SOCs) are unique devices that perform interconversion between chemical energy (particularly hydrogen) and electricity, providing efficient energy storage for site-specific and weather-dependent solar and wind resources.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: One of the key requirements for achieving high-performance reversible SOCs is the development of highly active bifunctional catalysts for the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and oxygen evolution reaction (OER).
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Herein, we investigate a La0.2Sr0.8Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (LSCF2882) material as a novel oxygen electrode for reversible SOCs at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Unlike most widely used La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF6428) with a rhombohedrally distorted perovskite structure, LSCF2882 possesses a simple cubic perovskite structure with a symmetric BO6 octahedral network.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the 3D bond valence sum calculation of the LSCF2882 structure suggests a reduction in oxygen ion conduction barrier energy.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Oxygen surface exchange (k(chem)) and diffusion (D-chem) coefficients of LSCF2882 determined by electrical conductivity relaxation are consistently remarkably higher by >2 and 20 times compared to those of LSCF6428 at 700 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: This result is further supported by a 43% reduction in the oxygen vacancy formation energy of LSCF2882 determined from density functional theory calculations.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The reversible SOCs with LSCF2882 oxygen electrodes greatly outperform LSCF6428 cells in both fuel cell (2.55 W cm(-2)) and electrolysis mode (2.09 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V) at 800 degrees C, with excellent reversible cycling stability.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Our findings strongly suggest that LSCF2882 is a promising candidate as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for high performance reversible SOCs at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: An efficient and robust lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite catalyst as a bifunctional oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells
